1.12.1.10:
Added:
/break Breaks the block you're looking at.
/spawn Teleports you to spawn.
/wild Teleports you randomly in the world.
/ptime <day/night/normal/6900> Sets your personal time, can be used on any server. I am not responsible if you get banned because of this.
1.12.1.11:
Added:
/smite <player> Strikes someone with lightning.
/through Teleports you through a wall.

Fixed:
All commands which you were supposed to be able to use on singleplayer or modded server not being able to use.
TL;DR a lot of permission issues.
1.12.1.12:
Added:
/hat Puts the item you're holding on your head.
/repair Repairs the item you're holding
/rename <name> Renames the item you're holding, you can use color codes like &1, &2, &3, etc.
